Articles.Content:
I has thinking of names for the Kerbal galaxies and I havent seen one from any Dev's so I want to see what everyone thinks it should be named and why?

My idea was Armstrong because Many of us looked up to us and I dont think a memorial is quite enough.
As far as I know intergalactic travel won't be implemented. I think the memorial is enough. As much as a hero he is to me, I don't want this game to become a giant tribute to one man.

Armstrong was a good man tho but i do recommend seeing this on the internet but i heard that Neil Armstrong used to play KSP too acouple months before u know what.

But never believe everything the internet says lol!
I did tell a few NASA staff members to try it and they loved it, Maybe word did get around and he did try it, Who knows but Back to names, There still in a galaxy even if there isnt any other stare
I'd suggest Laktos or something with Lakt in it, since the new Kerbal worlds seem to have assumed names that are oddly-spelled references to their "theme" in some way.
